name: Hoarderlands
description:
This game was for my university class at SAE. This is a representation remix so that means we had to remix a media text that already exists. We chose to remix borderlands with hoarding culture in a satirical sense. This prototype was done within 5 weeks so please don't judge it too harshly. 

Everyone that worked/helped on the project:

Game designer: Jake Foster

Audio developers: Tyler Roncari, Boris Borokhov, Joshua Coom

Poster creator: Tyler Roncari

This map was the demonstration map of the POLYGON - Town Pack slightly changed to fit the theme we were going for. 

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/polygon-town-pack
